page.title: 07Housing
page.content:
Building a house To build a house,you need to dig a trench which you fill with gravel,sand and water, making concrete..You then build up to ground level.you build a brick base,foundation.You build a wall of bricks or concrete blocks.You stick these together with cement and water. When you get to about six feet you put the up scaffolding to put planks on and the builders stand on them.The builders put UP trusses to to make the roof. You put felt over the trusses and hammer battons into the truces. You hang tiles from them. One house takes about five weeks or more to be built. Scott's house has six rooms,three bedrooms,a kitchen, bathroom and a lounge.
by Scott Powell, Owen Gower,Mark Bradshaw.Alex Russett.
